result.purpose: Defines data models and validation logic for various entities in a gaming context, including quests, rewards, user interactions, and external services.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file defines specific data models related to different aspects of the gaming application, promoting separation of concerns and maintainability.

internal/repositories/models/action.go.purpose: Defines data models and validation logic for quest actions in a gaming context.

internal/repositories/models/activity_gu.purpose: Defines the ActivityGuidanceEntity model for database interactions using GORM.

internal/repositories/models/campaign.go.purpose: Defines data models for campaign and reward pool log entities.

internal/repositories/models/events.go.purpose: Defines data models for events and user interactions in a quest system.

internal/repositories/models/external_se.purpose: Defines data models for external services related to game registration and check-in logs.

internal/repositories/models/model.go.purpose: Defines common error constants for data models.

internal/repositories/models/point_track.purpose: Defines the PointTrackerEntity model for tracking user points in a database.

internal/repositories/models/pool.go.purpose: Defines data models for reward pools in a quest system.

internal/repositories/models/preference..purpose: Defines the Preference model and its associated filter for managing user preferences.

internal/repositories/models/quest.go.purpose: Defines data models for quests in a gaming application.

internal/repositories/models/quest_pool..purpose: Defines data models for quest pools in a gaming application.

internal/repositories/models/quest_resol.purpose: Defines data models for logging history of actions performed by operators.

internal/repositories/models/quest_rewar.purpose: Defines data models for quest rewards in a gaming application.

internal/repositories/models/reward.go.purpose: Defines data models for rewards and transactions in a quest system.

internal/repositories/models/reward_allo.purpose: Defines the RewardAllocation model for database interactions using GORM.

internal/repositories/models/shop.go.purpose: Defines models for shop items, categories, and tiers in an e-commerce context.

internal/repositories/models/sponsor.go.purpose: Defines the SponsorEntity model for database interactions using GORM.

internal/repositories/models/user.go.purpose: Defines the UserEntity model for database interactions using GORM.

internal/repositories/models/user_action.purpose: Defines the UserActionEntity model for database interactions related to user actions in a quest system.

internal/repositories/models/user_quest..purpose: Defines data models for user quests and related entities in a quest management system.

internal/repositories/models/user_reward.purpose: Defines data models for user rewards and reward pools in a quest system.

internal/repositories/models/user_role.g.purpose: Defines user role models for database interactions.
